description:
Sakata’s big brother wants Goma-chan and is always daydreaming about the baby seal.
Sakata suggests giving Goma-chan a present so Goma-chan will want to be his pet instead of Ashibe’s.
His plan to give Goma-chan a chocolate covered fish goes awry when he gets splashed with cold water by Goma-chan...  
Source: crunchyroll
